desc: The American Board for Engineering and Technology (___) is the governing body that grants accreditation to university engineering degree programs in the United States.
Something that is ___ can generally exist only as an idea. It is the opposite of “concrete.”
Something that is ___ has been officially recognized by a governing body as meeting certain basic requirements.
Advertising is the process of calling consumers' attention to a company’s products or services.
Agriculture is the science of farming.
Analysis is the act of closely examining something.
Application is the act of putting an idea into practice.
An ___ is how you deal with something.
An ___ ___ is a line of workers or machines in a factory working on a product. A worker performs a job and then the product moves to the next worker.
To ___ something is to evaluate it.
To ___ something is to attempt to solve it.
An ___ is the line on a graph that shows a point’s position.

___ ___ refers to communication through body movements instead of speaking
A ___ material will break easily under pressure.
A ___ is a function of mathematics wherein numbers are manipulated to achieve a result. Calculations can include addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, and other operations.

A ___ is a device designed to throw objects long distances without the use of explosives such as gunpowder.
